description:
Drew came out of the closet when he was 15.
"I didn't see any point in hiding it," he said. "I knew my family was going to be cool."
Now he's 21 and he says he's a top "90 percent of the time."
The other 10 percent?
"I'm pretty picky about who goes inside me," he said. "I get off more on topping than bottoming, though."
He says his chest is his favorite body part.
"I like the hair," he said. "I love hairy guys."
He added: "I only wish I was little more hairy."
title: Drew
